mapper.insert: insert into cart (cart_no, cart_qty, productOption_productOption_no, product_product_no, cart_createdDate, users_users_id) values ( (select NVL(MAX(cart_no)+1,0)from cart), #{cart_qty}, (SELECT productOption_no FROM productOption WHERE productOption_type = #{productOption_type}), #{product_product_no}, sysdate, #{users_users_id})
mapper.update: update cart set users_users_id=#{users_users_id} where cart_ckId=#{cart_ckId}
update cart set cart_qty=#{cart_qty} where cart_no = #{cart_no}
mapper.select: select c.cart_no, c.productOption_productOption_no, c.cart_optionContent, c.cart_qty, p.product_no, p.product_name , p.product_price ,p.product_imgFile, o.productOption_no , o.productOption_type from CART c left outer join PRODUCT p on c.product_product_no = p.product_no left outer join PRODUCTOPTION o on c.productOption_productOption_no = o.productOption_no where users_users_id = #{users_users_id}
